answer: Juan Ponce de Leon was born in 1460 in Santeveras, Spain\.
He helped fight the Muslims in southern Spain in the early 1490's\.
optimal_answer: (de Leon)|(He) helped fight the Muslims in southern Spain

query: Who was on board Christopher Columbus' second expedition to the Americas?
answer: He was on board Christopher Columbus' second expedition to the Americas in 1493\.
Like many Spanish explorers, he was blood thirsty for gold\.
